name: Jinj
overview: Our story started many years ago. In a creepy mansion, in a lost island of the Atlantic Ocean... The evil professor Bel-Monte is trying to take over the world. To achieve that, he'll need a legendary object which will open Hell's doors, taking control of all beasts and beings that live there. The object is just a scroll with a musical score written in it. But it's hidden in the deepest part of the most remote mountain of the Andes. In order to get it, the professor will need the best treasure hunter of all times. Unfortunately for him, everyone in the island is no more intelligent than an onion. So he only has one option: Brainwash his servant so he can't remember his identity and then use his hypnosis techniques to make him believe he is the best mercenary. Johnny thinks his master is not just a drunkard, but he's also as mad as a hatter. One night, under alcohol's influence, the professor confessed his plan. Johnny tried to run away, but the professor's henchmen stopped him. He only was able, while trying to escape, to drop some clues for himself just in case...
